data.prayer: Father, your Word is essential for life and growth. Please challenge the 22 cultural Christians in the state of Îles Saint Paul et Amsterdam to read your Word for themselves today.
data.verse: It is written: 'Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that comes from the mouth of God.'

data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 1 believers in Îles Saint Paul et Amsterdam.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Îles Saint Paul et Amsterdam, French Southern Territories to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 24 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, help the fearful in Îles Saint Paul et Amsterdam, French Southern Territories to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

data.prayer: Father, comfort those who mourn in Îles Saint Paul et Amsterdam, French Southern Territories.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.

data.prayer: Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Îles Saint Paul et Amsterdam, French Southern Territories.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.prayer: Jesus, your return is closer than when we first believed. Please, set urgency in the hearts of the people living in the state of Îles Saint Paul et Amsterdam.
data.verse: Besides this you know the time, that the hour has come for you to wake from sleep. For salvation is nearer to us now than when we first believed.

data.focus_label: Îles Saint Paul et Amsterdam, French Southern Territories
data.section_summary:
the state of Îles Saint Paul et Amsterdam, French Southern Territories has a population of 25.

We estimate Îles Saint Paul et Amsterdam has 1 people who might know Jesus, 22 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 24 neighbors who need Jesus.
